parameters.content:
## MCP Main tools

This is an MCP main entry point. 
It has several tools that are available to use by AI client.

Most of the tools will execute another workflow


### How to use

* You need to be able to sign in via google in order to use google sheets node. 
  Refer to this [documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/) on how to sign in with google.
* Copy this [google sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XzoYEZflj1Rdo2MVKosRqXHSjkazE5vuwYWHLybX4b0/edit?usp=sharing)
* after you copy the sheet, make sure you enable sharing with everyone who has the link
* In each google sheet nodes, change `document` source to `By URL`, paste the link in the URL field
* For the nodes that related to transaction, change the `sheet` target to `transactions`
* For the nodes that related to budget, change the `sheet` target to `budgets`

parameters.content:
### Get all transaction

It will get list of transactions. 

Since currently google sheets integration doesn't support date range filter, so if the start date and end date criterial fall into same month it will get data by filtering helper column `month`. But if they're different month, then it get all transactions

### Remove transaction

It will remove transaction by ID. However we need to get the transaction first before removing to get row number. Because removing transaction needs a row number, can't be filtered by anything

### Add transaction

It will add transaction to a new row. In this workflow it will also check for the existing budget.

In the response, it has `task` field that will tell AI client what to do next. Either it will suggest user to add budget, or give warning if the budget already reached or surpassed.

### Update transaction

It will update transaction by ID. In this workflow it will also check for the existing budget.

It has the same checking budget workflow with the add transaction. I have to duplicate it since in the end it needs to ID from the different previous node. Currently n8n doesn't allow check return value from the node that has not been executed.

### Add monthly budget

It will add monthly budget.

#### pro tip :
You can ask AI client to add budget for several months by prompting such 

```
Add budget for fashion for this month until the end of the year, $500 per month
```

### update monthly budget

It will update budget

### Remove budget

It will remove existing budget

### Get existing budget

It will get existing budget

# MCP Personal Expense

This is a template for MCP that has tools to manage personal expenses and budget
